0.name: Fire in the Forge
0.description: Gerolt looks ready to fire up his forge.

previous_quests.name: Vows of Virtue, Deeds of Cruelty

0.name: Resistance Weapons - iLvl 485
0.intro_text: The first time you reach this part of the questline, you will take on the quest "Fire in the Forge" which only occurs once. This quest gives you the materials you need for your first Resistance Weapon for free. After you have completed this quest, the quest "Resistance is (Not) Futile" becomes available as a repeatable quest for any additional Resistance Weapons.
0.warning: This step only happens once! All additional weapons have to be done through the quest "Resistance is (Not) Futile" after this step is completed for the first time.
0.turn_in: Deliver 1 Thavnairian Scalepowder to Gerolt in Gangos.

1.name: Resistance Weapons - iLvl 485 (Additional Weapons)

acquisition.method1: Purchased for 1000 Allagan Tomestones of Poetics (250 each).

1.turn_in: Deliver 4 Thavnairian Scalepowder to Zlatan in Gangos.

2.name: Augmented Resistance Weapons - iLvl 500

acquisition.method1: Achieving Gold for FATEs in Coerthas Western Highlands and Sea of Clouds
acquisition.method2: Random drop from Skirmishes, Critical Engagements, and enemies in zone 1 of The Bozjan Southern Front

acquisition.method1: Achieving Gold for FATEs in Dravanian Forelands and Churning Mists
acquisition.method2: Random drop from Skirmishes, Critical Engagements, and enemies in zone 2 of The Bozjan Southern Front

acquisition.method1: Achieving Gold for FATEs in Dravanian Hinterlands and Azys Lla
acquisition.method2: Random drop from Skirmishes, Critical Engagements, and enemies in zone 3 of The Bozjan Southern Front

2.turn_in: With your Resistance Weapon in yout inventory, deliver the 60 Memories of the Dying to Zlatan in Gangos.
